channel.title: windows linux microsoft on Neil Grogan
channel.description: Recent content in windows linux microsoft on Neil Grogan

item.title: Dell refunds me for Windows!
item.description: As many of you know I am a Linux and Mac aficionado. For my Linux machines, all of them are Dell. I have been always pleased with Dells prices, how their machines work with Linux, their customer service and the fact they are made in Limerick, Ireland (I am from Ireland). I politely emailed Dell (well got up on my high horse), heres my first mail: I would like a refund of Windows XP since I am installing Ubuntu Linux on the computer when I get it.
